hero.title: Get more than an automation tool
hero.description: Tuxify is a platform that helps you to automate your business processes and workflows, so you can focus on what really matters.

features.title: Everything you need to automate your business processes and workflows in one place

ai.title: AI-powered workflows
ai.description: Tuxify uses AI to help you automate your workflows. It learns from your data and suggests new ways to automate your business processes.

graphFlow.title: Graph-based flows
graphFlow.description: Tuxify uses a graph-based approach to automate your workflows. It's easy to use and allows you to create complex workflows.

services.title: All your services
services.description: Tuxify allows you to connect to an unlimited number of services. You can connect to any service that has an API.

hero.title: Simple pricing, no hidden fees
hero.description: We offer a simple pricing model, with no hidden fees. You can start for free and upgrade as you grow.

free.title: Free
free.description: For small projects and personal use

integration.title: Connect to any service
integration.description: Tuxify allows you to connect to any service that has an API. You can connect to an unlimited number of services.

services.title: GitHub
services.description: GitHub is a development platform inspired by the way you work. From open source to business, you can host and review code, manage projects, and build software alongside 50 million developers.

services.title: Gmail
services.description: Gmail is email that's intuitive, efficient, and useful. 15 GB of storage, less spam, and mobile access.

services.title: Google Calendar
services.description: Google Calendar is a time-management and scheduling calendar service developed by Google. It became available in beta release April 13, 2006, and in general release in July 2009, on the web and as mobile apps for the Android and iOS platforms.

services.title: Google Sheets
services.description: Google Sheets is a spreadsheet program included as part of a free, web-based software office suite offered by Google within its Google Drive service. The service also includes Google Docs and Google Slides, a word processor and presentation program respectively.

services.title: Google Docs
services.description: Google Docs is a word processor included as part of a free, web-based software office suite offered by Google within its Google Drive service. The service also includes Google Sheets and Google Slides, a spreadsheet and presentation program respectively.

services.title: Google Drive
services.description: Google Drive is a file storage and synchronization service developed by Google. Launched on April 24, 2012, Google Drive allows users to store files on their servers, synchronize files across devices, and share files.

services.title: Linear
services.description: Linear helps streamline software projects, sprints, tasks, and bug tracking. It's built for high-performance teams.

services.title: Slack
services.description: Slack is a new way to communicate with your team. It's faster, better organized, and more secure than email.

services.title: LinkedIn
services.description: LinkedIn is a business and employment-oriented online service that operates via websites and mobile apps. Launched on May 5, 2003, it is mainly used for professional networking, including employers posting jobs and job seekers posting their CVs.
